meanings.definition: A unit of electrical conductance equal to the reciprocal of an ohm.
meanings.sent1: The circuit's efficiency was measured in mhos.
meanings.sent2: The scientist calculated the mhos of the new material.
meanings.sent3: The light bulb told the resistor, 'You have more mhos than me!'
meanings.sent4: His brain had mhos of creativity flowing through it.
meanings.sent5: The river of mhos allowed the electricity to flow smoothly.
